snippet.title: Medal of Honor Frontline Game Trailer 2002 - EA GAMES
snippet.description:
I worked on this while I was at Pixel Liberation Front. The CLient was EA GAMES.
This was the Game Trailer for Medal of Honor Allied Assault Game Trailer 2002
I was responsible for most of the Character Animation, some camera set ups and camera movements, rendering, texturing, lighting, etc.... 

Along with an awesome team, we made this happen. I am grateful for my time at PLF, as an animator, VFX artist, and Pre-Viz Artist, it has helped me in everything that I produce, create , animate, choreograph, direct, and edit now.

Thanks for watching!
